name: Dogs Puzzle
description:
Dogs Puzzle - Desktop Version

A Block Puzzle game with cute dogs. Train your brain to solve all levels in the game. Drag and drop onto the board and don't override each other.

  • This version (Early Access)  has 25 levels and goes from easy to hard
  • All assets in the game were designed by me.
  • The game will save your progress to local storage (Cookie) so you don't need to play again when you close the browser.
